name: The Grail
description:
Two years ago, a plague suddenly appeared and ravaged the human race. Everyone infected suffered a slow and miserable death. Drugs were quickly developed in large quantities to slow down the process of the plague but a cure has never been found. 

Among the survivors, there is a legend that has spread that the famed Holy Grail exists and may hold the key to saving humanity and end the plague: A legend not taken seriously. Not until you, the player, finds yourself infected…

You must find some way to get the Grail before a malevolent treasure hunting group snatches away your only last hope at salvation...

(NOTE: this is a university project and does contain bugs and incomplete features, also needs an Xbox controller to play)
